Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Provides grants related to the expansion and support of crisis intervention services and training programs
Summary: Relates to providing ten million dollars annually to be used for the provision of grants related to the expansion and support of crisis intervention services and diversion programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing grants related to the expansion and support of crisis intervention services and training programs
